class.name: PolarStereographicProjection
class.documentation: These are the attributes of the PolarStereographic projection.

parameter.name: subpage_map_area_coordinate_system
parameter.documentation: If set to projection, the coordinates of the bounding box are described in projection coordinates instead of the more natural lat/lon system ( this is useful in the WMS context)

parameter.name: subpage_map_area_definition_polar
parameter.release_info: Basic implementation: only used for steroGraphicPolar Projection
parameter.documentation: Method of defining a polar stereographic map

parameter.name: subpage_map_hemisphere
parameter.documentation: Hemisphere required for polar stereographic map(NORTH/SOUTH)

parameter.name: subpage_lower_left_latitude
parameter.documentation: Latitude of lower left corner of map, if map is CYLINDRICAL, MERCATOR or defined by 'CORNERS' in POLAR STEREOGRAPHIC

parameter.name: subpage_lower_left_longitude
parameter.documentation: Longitude of lower left corner of map, if map is CYLINDRICAL, MERCATOR or defined by 'CORNERS' in POLAR STEREOGRAPHIC

parameter.name: subpage_upper_right_latitude
parameter.documentation: Latitude of upper right corner of map, if map is CYLINDRICAL, MERCATOR or defined by 'CORNERS' in POLAR STEREOGRAPHIC

parameter.name: subpage_upper_right_longitude
parameter.documentation: Longitude of upper right corner of map, if map is CYLINDRICAL, MERCATOR or defined by 'CORNERS' in POLAR STEREOGRAPHIC

parameter.name: subpage_map_vertical_longitude
parameter.documentation: Vertical longitude of polar stereographic or Aitoff map
parameter.release_info: Only available for polar sterepgraphic projection

parameter.name: subpage_map_centre_latitude
parameter.documentation: Latitude of centre of polar stereographic map defined by 'CENTRE' or centre latitude of Lambert/satellite subarea projections

parameter.name: subpage_map_centre_longitude
parameter.documentation: Longitude of centre of polar stereographic map defined by 'CENTRE' or centre longitude of Lambert/satellite subarea projections

parameter.name: subpage_map_scale
parameter.documentation: Scale of polar stereographic or Aitoff map
